de.dezibel.data

Interface Lockable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Label, Medium, User

    public interface Lockable
    Interface which stores functionality to lock and unlock contents which implement it.
    Author:

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getLockText() 
      boolean isLocked()
      Checks if the content is locked.
      void lock()
      Locks the content, so no user unless the admin can access it.
      void lock(java.lang.String text)
      Locks the content, so no user unless the admin can access it and shows a locktext to inform about the lock.
      void unlock()
      Unlocks the content, so every user associated with it can access it again as he used to do before.

    • Method Detail

      • lock

        void lock()
        Locks the content, so no user unless the admin can access it.

      • lock

        void lock(java.lang.String text)
        Locks the content, so no user unless the admin can access it and shows a locktext to inform about the lock.
        Parameters:
        text - text which informs about the lock

      • unlock

        void unlock()
        Unlocks the content, so every user associated with it can access it again as he used to do before.

      • isLocked

        boolean isLocked()
        Checks if the content is locked.
        Returns:
        true if its locked, false otherwise

      • getLockText

        java.lang.String getLockText()
